Question: This person first appeared in 1947, three years before Peanuts started, in a comic strip by Charles M Schulz called Li'l Folks.
Hints: Charles "Charlie" this person is the main protagonist in the comic strip Peanuts by Charles M Schulz.
For instance, on April 15, 1953, Lucy tries to steal all of this person's caramels when he offers her one.
Usually, this person was a representative for everyone going through a time when they feel like nothing ever goes right for them.
